section.title: Example: Get the State for a AudioPlayer Control
section.description: This example demonstrates how to get the state object for an AudioPlayer control in a UX Component.
section.note: The AudioRecorderAndPlayer control's JavaScript object also has a *[js:_play]* property containing methods for the audio player class.
